department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

goal.ch:
(1) 了解遙測學的原理 (從可見光、紅外線、至雷達)。
(2) 了解影像處理的各種技術。
(3) 學習影像判釋的技巧。
(4) 練習遙測影像應用於地形、地質、地質災害、土木工程、水資源、環境保護等。
goal.en:
“(1) understanding the telemetry principle (radar) from visible light, infrared, to learn.
(2) to understand the various image processing technology.
(3) to learn the techniques of image interpretation.
(4) applied to the topography, geology, geological disasters, civil engineering, water resources, environmental protection practice telemetry images.“

outline.ch:
“This course is organized into three sections: section one on initiating a project, section two on exploration technique, section three on exploitation and neotectonic remote sensing.
Section I (week I ~ weekVI)
1. Project Flow and Obtaining Data
2. Photointerpretation Tools and Techniques
3. Remote Sensing Systems
Section II (week VII ~ weekXII)
4. Recognizing Rock Types
5. Recognizing Structure
6. Spectral Stratigraphy
7. Exploration Case History
Section III (week XIII ~ weekXVIII)
8. Exploitation Remote Sensing
9. Space Geodetic Measurement
10. Digital Elevation Model Extraction“

textbook.ch:
“1. Fancey, N.E., Gardiner, I.D. and Vaughan, R.A., 1996. The determination of geophysical parameters from space. Edinburgh, Scotland, Scottish University, Institute of Physics Pub.
2. Smith, D.E. and Turcotte, D.L., 1993. Contributions of space geodesy to geodynamics. Washington, D.C., American Geophysical Union.
3. Ravi P. Gupta, 2003. Remote Sensing Geology. Second Edition. Springer.
4. Gary L. Prost, 2001. Remote Sensing for Geologists – A Guide to Image Interpretation Second Edition. Taylor ＆ Francis.
5. Andrew N. Rencz, 1999. Remote Sensing for the Eath Science. John Wiley ＆ Sons Inc.
6. S.A. Drury, 1998. Images of the Earth - a Guide to Remote Sensing. Second edition. Oxford Science Publications.
7. Satellite Observations of The Earth’s Environment Accelerating the Transition of Research to Operations. 2003, National Academy of Sciences.
8. Bruce A. Campbell, 2002. Radar Remote Sensing of Planetary Surfaces. Cambridge.
9. Andrew N. Rencz, 1999. Remote Sensing for the Earth Sciences – Manual of Remote Sensing Third Edition, Volume 3. American Society for Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing.
10. Floyd M. Henderson, Anthony J. Lewis, 1998. Principles ＆ Applications of Imaging Radar Manual of Remote Sensing Third Edition, Volume 2. American Society for Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing.“
